main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Nurenberg, Germany on multiple dates, including December 7, 1954, and February 7, 1958.
interesting points: The UFO sightings involved bright, flashing lights and a silver, glowing, hovering object with flashing lights.
Several witnesses observed the UFO hovering and moving at high speeds before disappearing out of sight.
Descriptions of the UFO included being saucer-shaped and having no tail, with varied dimensions reported.
The sightings involved credible witnesses such as USAF pilots and navigators, as well as good clear weather conditions.
The lack of evidence led to a preliminary analysis of the possible cause of the sightings.
sighted object: silver, glowing, hovering object with flashing lights
witnesses: USAF pilots and navigators, as well as civilian witnesses
